Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 131st/Rhodes
ShortDescription: #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ellis, 130th, then resume their normal route due to fire department activity near 131st/Rhodes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 131st, Ellis, 130th, then resume their normal route due to fire department activity near 131st/Rhodes.

Allow extra travel time.
